courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science and Programming in Python
courses.subject: Computer Science
courses.description: An introduction to computer science as a tool to solve real-world analytical problems, using Python 3.5.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Introduction and Goals
lessons.content: Introduction to computational thinking, basic Python syntax, and problem-solving.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Core Elements of Programs
lessons.content: Focus on variables, expressions, and statements in Python.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Control Structures
lessons.content: Introduction to loops, conditionals, and branching statements.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Functions
lessons.content: Concept of functions in programming and their practical applications.

courses.title: Single Variable Calculus
courses.subject: Mathematics
courses.description: Covers differential and integral calculus of functions of one variable.

lessons.title: Limits and Continuity
lessons.content: Understanding the concept of limits and why they are important in calculus.

lessons.title: Derivatives
lessons.content: Introduction to the concept of derivatives and its applications.

lessons.title: Integrals
lessons.content: Explaining integrals and their use in calculating areas under curves.

lessons.title: Fundamentals of Integration
lessons.content: Techniques and rules for integrating functions.

courses.title: Introduction to Psychology
courses.subject: Psychology
courses.description: Provides a broad overview of psychological concepts, theories, and research.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Psychology
lessons.content: Overview of the history, methods, and key concepts in psychology.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Brain and Behavior
lessons.content: Exploring the relationship between the brain and behavior.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Sensation and Perception
lessons.content: How we perceive and interpret sensory information.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Memory
lessons.content: Understanding how memory works and its limitations.

courses.title: Principles of Economics
courses.subject: Economics
courses.description: This course teaches the basics of microeconomics and macroeconomics.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Economics
lessons.content: Basic economic concepts, opportunity cost, and economic thinking.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Supply and Demand
lessons.content: Introduction to supply and demand curves and market equilibrium.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Elasticity
lessons.content: Understanding price elasticity of demand and supply.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Market Structures
lessons.content: Explaining different types of market structures (perfect competition, monopoly).

courses.title: Introduction to Biology
courses.subject: Biology
courses.description: An introduction to the concepts of biology, including molecular biology and ecology.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Principles of Biology
lessons.content: Introduction to the scientific method and basic biological principles.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Cellular Biology
lessons.content: Cell structure and function, DNA and RNA.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Evolution
lessons.content: Concepts of evolution, natural selection, and adaptation.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Genetics
lessons.content: Exploring inheritance and genetic variation.

courses.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
courses.subject: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: An introduction to the concepts and techniques of artificial intelligence.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is AI?
lessons.content: Overview of artificial intelligence and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Search Algorithms
lessons.content: Introduction to search algorithms and problem-solving techniques.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Machine Learning Basics
lessons.content: Understanding the basics of machine learning and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Neural Networks
lessons.content: Introduction to neural networks and deep learning.

courses.title: Data Science Fundamentals
courses.subject: Data Science
courses.description: An introduction to data science concepts, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Data Science
lessons.content: Overview of data science, its applications, and tools.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Data Wrangling
lessons.content: Techniques for cleaning and preparing data for analysis.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Data Visualization
lessons.content: Creating effective visualizations to communicate insights.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Introduction to Machine Learning
lessons.content: Basics of machine learning and its applications in data science.

courses.title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
courses.subject: Cybersecurity
courses.description: Learn the basics of cybersecurity, including threats, vulnerabilities, and protection mechanisms.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Cybersecurity Basics
lessons.content: Introduction to cybersecurity concepts and the importance of securing systems.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Common Threats and Vulnerabilities
lessons.content: Understanding common cybersecurity threats and how to mitigate them.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Network Security
lessons.content: Basics of securing networks and preventing unauthorized access.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Cryptography
lessons.content: Introduction to cryptographic techniques and their applications in cybersecurity.

courses.title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
courses.subject: Cloud Computing
courses.description: Learn the basics of cloud computing, including cloud services, deployment models, and security.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is Cloud Computing?
lessons.content: Introduction to cloud computing concepts and benefits.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Cloud Service Models
lessons.content: Understanding IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS models.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Cloud Deployment Models
lessons.content: Exploring public, private, and hybrid cloud deployment models.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Cloud Security
lessons.content: Basics of securing cloud environments and data.

courses.title: Introduction to Blockchain
courses.subject: Blockchain
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of blockchain technology and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is Blockchain?
lessons.content: Introduction to blockchain technology and its key components.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: How Blockchain Works
lessons.content: Understanding the mechanics of blockchain and distributed ledgers.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Blockchain Applications
lessons.content: Exploring real-world applications of blockchain technology.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Smart Contracts
lessons.content: Introduction to smart contracts and their use cases.

courses.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
courses.subject: Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn the basics of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is Machine Learning?
lessons.content: Overview of machine learning concepts and applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Supervised Learning
lessons.content: Understanding supervised learning and its algorithms.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Unsupervised Learning
lessons.content: Introduction to unsupervised learning and clustering techniques.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Neural Networks
lessons.content: Basics of neural networks and deep learning.

courses.title: Introduction to DevOps
courses.subject: DevOps
courses.description: Learn the principles and practices of DevOps, including CI/CD and automation.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is DevOps?
lessons.content: Introduction to DevOps and its benefits.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: CI/CD Pipelines
lessons.content: Understanding continuous integration and continuous delivery.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Infrastructure as Code
lessons.content: Introduction to IaC and its tools.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Monitoring and Logging
lessons.content: Basics of monitoring and logging in DevOps.

courses.title: Introduction to Game Development
courses.subject: Game Development
courses.description: Learn the basics of game development, including game design and programming.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Game Development
lessons.content: Overview of game development and its components.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Game Design Principles
lessons.content: Understanding the principles of game design.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Game Programming Basics
lessons.content: Introduction to programming for games using Unity.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Game Physics
lessons.content: Basics of physics in game development.

courses.title: Introduction to Robotics
courses.subject: Robotics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of robotics, including kinematics, sensors, and control systems.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Robotics
lessons.content: Overview of robotics and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Kinematics
lessons.content: Understanding the motion of robots and their components.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Sensors and Perception
lessons.content: Introduction to sensors and how robots perceive their environment.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Control Systems
lessons.content: Basics of control systems in robotics.

courses.title: Introduction to Quantum Computing
courses.subject: Quantum Computing
courses.description: Learn the basics of quantum computing, including qubits, quantum gates, and algorithms.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is Quantum Computing?
lessons.content: Introduction to quantum computing and its principles.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Qubits and Quantum Gates
lessons.content: Understanding qubits and how quantum gates work.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Quantum Algorithms
lessons.content: Introduction to quantum algorithms like Grover's and Shor's algorithms.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Quantum Applications
lessons.content: Exploring real-world applications of quantum computing.

courses.title: Introduction to Ethical Hacking
courses.subject: Cybersecurity
courses.description: Learn the basics of ethical hacking, including penetration testing and vulnerability assessment.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is Ethical Hacking?
lessons.content: Introduction to ethical hacking and its importance.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Reconnaissance
lessons.content: Understanding reconnaissance techniques in ethical hacking.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Exploitation
lessons.content: Basics of exploiting vulnerabilities in systems.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Reporting and Mitigation
lessons.content: How to report vulnerabilities and mitigate risks.

courses.title: Introduction to Augmented Reality
courses.subject: Augmented Reality
courses.description: Learn the basics of augmented reality, including AR development tools and applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is Augmented Reality?
lessons.content: Introduction to augmented reality and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: AR Development Tools
lessons.content: Overview of tools used for AR development.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: AR Design Principles
lessons.content: Understanding design principles for AR applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: AR Applications
lessons.content: Exploring real-world applications of AR technology.

courses.title: Introduction to Natural Language Processing
courses.subject: Natural Language Processing
courses.description: Learn the basics of NLP, including text processing, sentiment analysis, and language models.

lessons.title: Lecture 1: What is NLP?
lessons.content: Introduction to natural language processing and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 2: Text Processing
lessons.content: Understanding text preprocessing techniques.

lessons.title: Lecture 3: Sentiment Analysis
lessons.content: Basics of sentiment analysis and its applications.

lessons.title: Lecture 4: Language Models
lessons.content: Introduction to language models and their use cases.
